title: Zachary Quinto 🤷‍♂️😉❤️😈😏
description:
Zachary Quinto (Star Trek, Heroes) talks to Justin about volunteering at The Trevor Project, how becoming sober was the best decision for him, and why Transcendental Meditation changed his life for the better.
